exercise.execution: Push one lever out and down until arm is fully extended. Return until forearm contacts upper arm. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

exercise.preparation: Stand between handles facing machine. Grasp parallel handles and position elbows back. Squat down slightly by bending hips and knees, just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack.
exercise.execution: Push levers down by straightening arms downward. Allow lever bar to raise with elbows pointing back until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Smith Close Grip Incline Bench Press
exercise.preparation: Lie on incline bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on inside of one of two benches placed parallel, slightly less than leg's length away. Place hands on edge of bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench and position heels on adjacent bench with legs straight. Have assistant place weight on lap near hips.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight. Partner can place weight plate(s) on back if needed.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place weight on dip belt around waist or place dumbbell between lower legs just above feet. Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight.
exercise.execution: Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place one foot on middle of exercise band with ends looped on shoulder width dip bars. Push band down partially by extending leg. Mount dip bar with arms straight and shoulders above hands. Place other foot on exercise band next to other foot. Keep hips straight.
exercise.execution: Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on inside of one of two benches placed parallel, slightly less than leg's length away. Place hands on edge of bench, straighten arms, slide rear end off of bench, and position heels on adjacent bench with legs straight.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on side of bench. Place hands on edge of bench. Place feet on floor away from bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench, and position feet on floor with knees bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on side of bench. Place hands on edge of bench. Position feet away from bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench, and rest heels on floor with legs straight.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise your body and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor with bench or elevation behind body. Position hands on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Place feet on bench or elevation. Raise body in plank position with body straight and arms extended.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower upper body to floor by bending arms. To allow for full descent, pull head back slightly without arching back. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel before medicine ball. Place hands on upper part of ball on each side. Balance upper body above ball with arms extended. Straighten body and place forefeet back, away from ball on floor shoulder width apart.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower body by bending arms until chest touches ball. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp horizontal bar (lower than chest height) with hands shoulder width or slightly narrower. Position forefeet back from bar with arms and body straight. Arms should be perpendicular to body.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, lower chest to bar by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp triceps rope hanging from secured bar (chest height or lower). Position forefeet on floor, back from bar with body straight. Elbows can be either be completely bent or straight during mount with upper arms somewhat perpendicular with body.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, raise body up and back up until arms are extended. Lower body by bending elbows, allowing head to travel between ends of rope. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight.
exercise.execution: Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off end of benches. Grip should be somewhat narrow. Position feet out in front with legs straight, heels on floor, and torso upright.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to point back. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off ends of benches. Grip should be somewhat narrow. Position feet in front with legs bent and torso upright.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to point back. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two suspension handles and grasp handles on each side of torso. Hold position firmly and lift feet from floor.
exercise.execution: Push body up until arms are straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two suspension handles, approximately mid-thigh height. Grasp handles on each side and straighten arms with shoulders above hands. Holding position firmly and place bodyweight on handles. Place toes on floor behind with knees bent and feet back.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms back. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees to bend, keeping toes in contact with floor. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up back up until arms are straight. Repeat with minimal assistance from legs.

exercise.preparation: Grasp handles and step forward between suspension trainers. Position arms downward and slightly forward, nearly parallel with suspension straps. Lean forward, placing upper body weight onto handles with arms straight, while stepping back onto forefeet so body is leaning forward at desired angle. Straighten body, so torso is in-line with legs.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending elbows, allowing head to travel between suspension handles. Raise body up and back up until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp triceps rope hanging from secured bar (chest height or lower). Position forefeet on floor, back from bar with body straight. Elbows can be either be completely bent or straight during mount with upper arms somewhat perpendicular with body.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, raise body up and back up until arms are extended. Lower body by bending elbows, allowing head to travel between ends of rope. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand on bench or elevation between parallel bars. Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Bend knees and place toes on bench or elevation behind and below body.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms back. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees to bend, keeping toes in contact with bench or elevation. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders push body up until arms are straight. Repeat with minimal assistance from legs.

exercise.mechanic: Pull elbow back and toward head. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull participant's elbow behind their head while keeping forearm against upperarm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull towel downward with lower arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise barbell straight up so elbows travel back as elbows flex. Follow contour of hips and waist. As elbows continues to flex, begin bringing elbows forward when forearms rises past horizontal position. Continue upward over chest until forearms are perpendicular. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between or facing double low pulleys. Grasp stirrups to each side, palms facing forward.
exercise.execution: Pull one stirrup up forward and upward toward shoulder while keeping elbow stationary. Return until arm is fully extended. Repeat on other arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat situated between two low pulleys down to each side. Grasp stirrups in each hand, palms facing forward.
exercise.execution: Pull one stirrup up toward shoulder while keeping elbow stationary. Return until arm is fully extended. Repeat with other arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Grasp low pulley cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Stand close to pulley.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp low cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Stand close to cable bar.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between or facing double low pulleys. Grasp stirrups to each side, palms facing forward.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrups forward and upward toward shoulders while keeping elbows stationary. Return until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat situated between two low pulleys down to each side. Grasp stirrups in each hand, palms facing forward.
exercise.execution: Pull both stirrups up toward shoulders while keeping elbows stationary. Return until arms are fully extended and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Face low pulley and grasp stirrup cable attachment to one side with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: With elbow to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on floor with feet or heels against pulley machine. Grasp low pulley cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Lie back on floor with arms to sides.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, pull bar until elbows are flexed. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight.
exercise.execution: With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit on end of bench with dumbbell in each hand and legs together. Position dumbbells with palms facing inward and arms hanging down straight.
exercise.execution: With elbows back to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit back on 45-60 degree incline bench. With arms hanging down straight, position two dumbbells with palms facing inward.
exercise.execution: With elbows back to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles until elbows are fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise lever on handle until elbow is fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate movement between sides.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing arms length away from waist to head height horizontal bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Position body under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Arms should be straight, approximately perpendicular to body. Heels should make contact with floor with feet about perpendicular to legs.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Turn body away from positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Scoot hips forward away from hands. Hold stretch.
Continue to raise participant's arms upward behind their body. Hold stretch.
Raise arms away from body. Hold stretch.
Bring rear end and back toward wall and squat down. Hold stretch for 20 seconds.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body is reclined back. Position palms up or slightly inward.
exercise.execution: Bring handles toward shoulders by flexing arms, while keeping elbows pointed forward. Return by straightening arms and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Placing back of arms on pad with one foot forward, grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. From low rack or partner, grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until arms are flexed. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Facing low pulley cable, sit on seat or bench with legs apart to each side. Grasp stirrup attachment. Place upper arm against inner thigh.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrup to front of shoulder until elbow is completely flexed. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrups with each hand. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad with palms up.
exercise.execution: Raise one stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating between arms.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind preacher bench. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Position back of arms on pad.
exercise.execution: Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable One Arm Standing Preacher Curl
exercise.preparation: Standing behind standing preacher bench and grasp cable stirrup. Place back of arm on pad with palm up.
exercise.execution: Raise stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrup. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arm on pad with palm up.
exercise.execution: Raise stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrups with each hand. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad with palms up.
exercise.execution: Raise both stirrups upward toward shoulders. Lower stirrups until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. Grasp cable attachment with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until arms are flexed. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench. Grasp dumbbell between feet. Place back of upper arm to inner thigh. Lean into leg to raise elbow slightly.
exercise.execution: Raise dumbbell to front of shoulder. Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Grasp dumbbell and sit on preacher bench. With arm bent and palm facing shoulder, place back of arm down on pad.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Raise dumbbell until forearm is vertical. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: With dummbell in hand, arm bent, and palm facing shoulder, place back of arm on pad.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Raise dumbbell until forearm is vertical. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Dumbbell Standing Preacher Curl (on incline bench)
exercise.preparation: Stand behind incline bench adjusted 45º to 55º. With dumbbell in hand, arm bent, and palm facing shoulder, place back of arm on pad.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Raise dumbbell until forearm is vertical. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. From elevated platform or partner, grasp dumbbell and position palms forward.
exercise.execution: Raise dumbbells until arms are flexed. Lower dumbbells until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Preacher Curl (arms high, plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handles toward shoulders. Return handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms high, plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever handle toward shoulder. Return handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind arm pad and face lever handles on opposite side. Place one foot forward under arm pad and opposite foot back on foot bar. Lean over arm pads and grasp handles with slightly narrower than shoulder width underhand grip. Squat down and position back of upper arms on arm pads.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handles toward shoulders. Return handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever handle toward shoulder. Return handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind arm pad and face lever handles on opposite side. Place one foot forward under arm pad and opposite foot back on foot bar. Lean over arm pads and grasp handles with slightly narrower than shoulder width underhand grip. Squat down and position back of upper arms on arm pads.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body is reclined back. Position palms up or slightly inward.
exercise.execution: Bring handles toward shoulders by flexing arms, while keeping elbows pointed forward. Return by straightening arms and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place back of arms on pad with one foot forward. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable rope with palms facing inward. Stand upright with arms straight down to sides.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise rope forward and upward with both arms until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Stand close to cable bar.
exercise.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind preacher bench. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Position back of arms on pad.
exercise.execution: Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight.
exercise.execution: With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell until forearm is vertical and thumb faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with alternative arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles and position grips with thumb side up. Align elbows at near same pivot point as fulcrum of lever.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders, maintaining palms in grip. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with overhand grip. Position elbows to sides so they are in line with lever's fulcrum.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles until elbows are fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand grip. Align elbows at near same pivot point as fulcrum of lever.
exercise.execution: Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Straighten arms and externally rotate shoulders by back. Hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp bar with narrow to shoulder width underhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
exercise.execution: Allow barbell to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise barbell back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width underhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
exercise.execution: Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm up and wrist just beyond knees.
exercise.execution: Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands; over hand grip.
exercise.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp dumbbell with underhand grip. Rest forearm on thigh with wrist just beyond knee.
exercise.execution: Allow dumbbell to roll out of palm down to fingers. Raise dumbbell back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp half loaded dumbbell with plate on pinkie side. Position arm down to side.
exercise.execution: Bend wrist so weighted side is pulled upward. Lower until weighted side is pointing downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat, straddling apparatus. Grasp lever handles on each side; fingers around lever handles and base of thumbs around stationary bars.
exercise.execution: Squeeze bars together with both hands until lower lever makes contact with upper bars. Lower to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with underhand grip. Place forearm on padded platform.
exercise.execution: Raise bar up until wrist is fully flexed. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp lever handles on each side; fingers around lever handles and base of thumbs around stationary bars.
exercise.execution: Squeeze bars together with both hands until lever makes contact with stationary bars. Lower to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Rotate handle over and under so handle is in slightly downward position toward thighs. Grasp handle with thumb ups grip so fist is pulled up under resistance.
exercise.execution: Bend wrist so pinky side of fist is pulled down. Return to starting position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with underhand grip to each side. Place forearms on arm pads.
exercise.execution: Raise handles up until wrist is fully flexed. Lower handles until wrists are full hyperextended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp wrist roller handles with both hands; over hand grip.
exercise.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place hands on knobs at each end of roller.
exercise.execution: With left hand gripping knob, relax grip of right hand and slide grip upward so fingers are more over knob (by radial deviation) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and rotate knob with right hand so thumb travels away from body (by ulnar deviation). Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack.

exercise.preparation: Stand in front of apparatus. Grasp bar grips with one hand; fingers around far bar and base of thumb around near stationary bar.
exercise.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until far bar makes contact with nearest bar. Release to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend over and grasp bar grips with both hands; fingers under lower bar and base of thumbs over top stationary bar.
exercise.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend over and grasp bar grips with one hand; fingers under lower bar and base of thumb over top stationary bar.
exercise.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Sled One Hand Pinch Grip (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Place hand around horizontal surfaces; fingers along lower surface and thumb on upper surface.
exercise.execution: Pinch surfaces together until lower part makes contact with upper part. Release to original position or just before surfaces become too far apart. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Pushing hands together, lower away from body until wrists separate. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Lean back with arms straight. Hold stretch.
Pull finger and wrist upward and back toward forearm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Shift body back with elbows straight. Hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
exercise.execution: Raise barbell by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
exercise.execution: Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable One Arm Reverse Wrist Curl
exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm facing down and with wrist just beyond knee.
exercise.execution: Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands; over hand grip.
exercise.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip in front of handle (by flexing wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and hyperextend right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.

exercise.preparation: Grasp half loaded dumbbell with plate on thumb side. Position arm down to side.
exercise.execution: Bend wrist so weighted side is pulled upward. Lower until weighted side is pointing downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grip dumbbell with overhand grip. Rest forearm on thigh with wrist just beyond knee.
exercise.execution: Raise dummbell by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with overhand grip. Place forearm on padded platform.
exercise.execution: Raise bar until wrist is fully hyperextended and return until wrist is fully flexed. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Rotate handle under and over so handle is in slightly upward position toward head. Grasp handle with thumb ups grip so thumb side of fist is pulled away under resistance.
exercise.execution: Bend wrist so thumb side of fist is pulled up. Return to starting position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp handles with overhand grip to each side. Place forearms on arm pads.
exercise.execution: Raise handles until wrist is fully hyperextended. Lower handles until wrists are fully flexed. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place hands on knobs at each end of roller.
exercise.execution: With left hand gripping knob, relax grip of right hand and slide grip downward so fingers are under bottom of knob (by ulnar deviation) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and rotate knob with right hand so thumb travels closer to body (by radial deviation). Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack.

exercise.mechanic: Lean against floor with elbows straight. Hold stretch for 20 seconds.
Extend or straighten elbow. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie on bench or mat. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; pinkie positioned near weighted side. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place arm on hip or side of waist. Position thumb upward (supinated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (pronation). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell with thumb next to weighted side. Lie on bench on side with weight and position arm with "half dumbbell" on bench. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and tucked bent elbow under body. Position thumb down (supinated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (pronation). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit next to elevated surface, approximately arm pit height. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; pinkie positioned near weighted side. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place upperarm on elevated surface. Position thumb upward (supinated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (pronation). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with underhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads.
exercise.execution: Rotate shafts by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp open handles with both hands
exercise.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Rotate shaft by turning palms downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on bench or mat. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; thumb next to side with weight. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place forearm on hip, or side of waist. Position thumb downward (pronated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (supination). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell with pinkie finger next to weight side. Lie on bench on side with weight and position arm with "half dumbbell" on bench. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and tuck bent elbow under body. Position thumb up (pronated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (supinated). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit next to elevated surface, approximately arm pit height. With hand of arm next to elevated surface, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; thumb next to side with weight. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place upperarm on elevated surface. Position thumb downward (pronated).
exercise.execution: Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (supination). Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with overhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads.
exercise.execution: Rotate shafts by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight.
exercise.execution: With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit back on 45-60 degree incline bench. With arms hanging down straight, position two dumbbells with palms facing inward.
exercise.execution: With elbows back to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

exercise.preparation: Grasp open handles with both hands
exercise.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Rotate shaft by turning palms downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to upper waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie chest down on elevated bench. Grasp cambered barbell below with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to upper waist or lower chest. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on incline and place feet on lower bar, or foot platform. Slide hips down by bending knees. Bend over and grasp cable attachment. Slide hips back, positioning knees with slight bend.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist while straightening back upright. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until arms are extended, shoulders are stretched forward, and lower back is flexed forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on incline and place feet on lower bar, or foot platform. Slide hips down by bending knees. Bend over and grasp cable attachment. Slide hips back, positioning knees with slight bend. Straighten lower back so it is approximately perpendicular to incline.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist. Pull shoulders back and lift chest by arching back. Return until arms are extended, back is straight and perpendicular to incline, and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place right knee on lower pad (positioned to right side) with foot of other leg slightly back out to side and knee slightly bent. Place right forearm on right side of upper pad and grasp handle. Grasp cable stirrup below with left hand. Allow left shoulder to be pulled forward without spinal rotation.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrup up to side until elbow travels beyond surface of back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched downward. Repeat and continue with opposite side.

exercise.preparation: Straddle head of bench and grasp stirrups on two high pulley cables. Lie on bench with stirrups in each hand and arms extended upward.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrups down to each side of chest until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched upward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrup. Step back away from pulley, with foot on same side as exercising arm, positioned out to side well behind forward foot. Bend over with hand on nearby bar or above knee for support. Keep back straight and knees slightly bent. Allow shoulder with stirrup to be pulled forward.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso, pulling shoulder back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on platform or secured bench in order to grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Position hips back with knees slightly bent . Allow shoulder with stirrup to be pulled forward.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso, slightly twisting through waist. Pull shoulder back and push chest forward during contraction. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on platform or secured bench close to cable attachment. Bend forward and grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Slide hips back by positioning knees with slight bend. Allow shoulder with stirrup to be pulled forward with forward bend and twist through waist.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side, extending and twisting through waist. Pull shoulders back and sit upright while pushing chest forward during contraction. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat and perform exercise with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable One Arm Seated High Row
exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on platform or secured bench close to cable attachment. Bend forward and grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Slide hips back by positioning knees with slight bend. Allow arm, shoulder, and torso to be pulled forward under weight on cable.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso, straightening back and leaning back slightly. Pull shoulder back and push chest forward during contraction. Return until arm is extended and torso is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable One Arm Straight Back Seated High Row
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat or bench. Bend forward and grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Position torso upright allowing shoulder to be pulled forward under weight on cable.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso while pulling shoulder back, arching spine, and pushing chest forward. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat or bench. Bend forward and grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Allow shoulder with stirrup to be pulled forward with twist through waist.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso while twisting though waist in opposite direction. Pull shoulder back and push chest forward. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on bench or platform in order to grasp cable attachment. Place feet on vertical platform. Slide hips back positioning knees with slight bend. Allow weight on cable to pull torso forward while stretching arms and shoulders upward.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist and lean back slightly. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until torso, arms, and shoulders pulled forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit and grasp cable stirrups one with each hand. Lean back slightly allowing arms, shoulders, and torso to be pulled forward under weight on cables.
exercise.execution: Pull one cable stirrup to side. Pull shoulder back, push chest forward, and rotate body slightly toward pulling arm. Return until arm is extended and torso faces forward. Pull with opposite arm alternating between each side. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on seat or bench in order to grasp cable attachment. Place feet on vertical platform. Slide hips back positioning knees with slight bend.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist while straightening lower back. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until arms are extended, shoulders are stretched forward, and lower back is flexed forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on bench with feet on foot bar or vertical platform. Grasp close grip cable attachment. Straighten torso upright and slide hips back so knees are slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist. Pull shoulders back and lift chest by arching back. Return until arms are extended, back is straight, and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on platform in order to grasp cable attachment. With awider than shoulder width grip, slide hips back positioning knees with slight bend.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist while pulling torso upright. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until arms are extended, shoulders are stretched forward, and lower back is flexed forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable Wide Grip Straight Back Seated Row
exercise.preparation: Sit slightly forward on bench or platform in order to grasp cable bar attachment. With wider than shoulder width overhand grip, straighten torso upright and slide hips back until knees are only slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to waist. Pull shoulders back and lift chest by arching back. Return until arms are extended, back is straight, and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand to side of medium height, rotating pulley. Place hand shoulder height or slightly lower on support bar with arm straight. Place foot nearest supporting arm forward with knee slightly bent and opposite foot back. Grasp cable stirrup with one hand, allowing shoulder to be pulled forward under weight on cable.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso while pulling shoulder back, arching spine, and pushing chest forward. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand to side of low pulley. Place hand on support bar with arm straight. Place foot nearest supporting arm forward with knee slightly bent and opposite foot back. Grasp cable stirrup with one hand, allowing shoulder to be pulled forward under weight on cable.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso while pulling shoulder back, arching spine, and pushing chest forward. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing high pulley positioned slightly above head level. Grasp stirrup with one hand and step back so arm is straight. With leg of opposite side as loaded arm, plant forefoot far back on floor. Slightly bend knee of forward leg, same direction as foot. Allow shoulder with stirrup to be pulled forward with twist through waist.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment to side of torso and rotate body toward side of pulling arm. Pull shoulder back and push chest forward. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is pulled forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Kneel over side of bench by placing knee and hand of supporting arm on bench. Position foot of opposite leg slightly back to side. Grasp dumbbell from floor.
exercise.execution: Pull dumbbell to up to side until it makes contact with ribs or until upper arm is just beyond horizontal. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched downward. Repeat and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie chest down on elevated bench. Grasp dumbbells below.
exercise.execution: Pull dumbbells to sides until upper arm is just beyond horizontal or height of back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie chest down on slightly inclined bench. Grasp dumbbells below.
exercise.execution: Pull dumbbells to sides until upper arm is just beyond height of back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: With lever handles to sides, bend knees slightly and bend over with back straight. Grasp lower handles.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handles up to sides. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with toes under bar facing fulcrum. Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever One Arm Bent-over Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Kneel over side of bench facing loaded side of lever bar by placing knee and hand of supporting arm on bench. Position foot of opposite leg slightly back to side, straddling bar. Grasp bar from floor, several inches under barbell plates.
exercise.execution: Pull lever bar up to side until bar contacts shoulder or just until elbow travels behind height of back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched downward. Repeat and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Wide Grip Bent-over Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: With lever handles to sides, bend knees slightly and bend over with back straight. Grasp wider handles.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handles up to sides. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie chest on inclined platform and grasp lever handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever up as high as possible. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Close Grip Incline Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Lie chest on inclined platform and grasp lever close grip handles.
exercise.execution: Pull lever up as high as possible. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever One Arm Standing Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Place hand on support bar and grasp lever far forward. Place foot on side of moving arm on foot support and position opposite foot behind.
exercise.execution: Pull lever to side while twisting torso toward opposite side. Pull shoulder back and push chest forward during contraction. Return until arm is extended and torso is pulled toward original direction. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Narrow Grip Seated Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Alternating Narrow Grip Seated Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever back until elbow is behind back and shoulder is pulled back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Wide Grip Seated Row (high bar, plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Alternating Wide Grip Seated Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever back until elbow is behind back and shoulder is pulled back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Wide Grip Seated Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Seated Row (no chest pad, plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with each hand. Place feet on vertically angled platform. Slide hips back with knees slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Pull handles to waist while straightening torso upright. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until arms are extended, shoulders are stretched forward, and lower back is flexed forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Straight Back Seated Row (no chest pad, plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with feet positioned on foot bar or platform. Grasp handles with each hand. Position torso upright with knees bent slightly.
exercise.execution: Pull handles to body. Pull shoulders back and lift chest by arching back. Return until arms are extended, back is straight, and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand/neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Alternating Underhand Seated Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever back until elbow is behind back and shoulder is pulled back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over lever handles with back straight. Grasp lever handles with shoulder width to wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever up to torso. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over lever handles with back straight. Grasp lever handles with shoulder width to wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever up to torso. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Close Grip T-bar Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over lever handles with back straight. Grasp parallel lever handles.
exercise.execution: Pull handles up to waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Close Grip T-bar Row (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over lever handles with back straight. Grasp parallel lever handles.
exercise.execution: Pull handles up to waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever handle back until elbow is behind back and shoulder is pulled back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position thighs under pad. Lean forward and grasp lever handles above.
exercise.execution: Pull lever down while leaning back slightly. As elbows travel to sides, lift chest slightly and pull shoulders and elbows back. Return until arms are extended and body and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Push foot lever if available. Grasp narrower parallel grip handles.
exercise.execution: Pull lever back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp outer lever handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with each hand. Place feet on vertically angled platform. Slide hips back with knees slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Pull handles to waist while straightening torso upright. Pull shoulders back and push chest forward while arching back. Return until arms are extended, shoulders are stretched forward, and lower back is flexed forward. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Straight Back Seated Row (no chest pad)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with feet positioned on foot bar or platform. Grasp handles with each hand. Position torso upright with knees bent slightly.
exercise.execution: Pull handles to body. Pull shoulders back and lift chest by arching back. Return until arms are extended, back is straight, and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handles back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers back until elbows are behind back and shoulders are pulled back. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and position chest against pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull one lever handle back until elbow is behind back and shoulder is pulled back. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Pull bar to upper waist. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched downward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lay on back under fixed horizontal bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Place back of heels on elevated surface.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lay on back under fixed horizontal bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lay on back under fixed horizontal bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Place back of heels on elevated surface.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing arms length away from waist to head height horizontal bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Position body under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Arms should be straight, approximately perpendicular to body. Heels should make contact with floor.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lay on back with belly under fixed horizontal bar. Bend knees and position feet on floor. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Keeping hips on floor and low back straight, pull torso up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing arms length away from waist to head height horizontal bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Position body under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Arms should be straight, approximately perpendicular to body. Heels should make contact with floor with feet about perpendicular to legs.
exercise.execution: Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position suspension handles higher than arms' length above floor. Sit on floor and grasp handles. Position body supine hanging from handles with arms straight, shoulders under handles, body straight, and back of heels on floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up so sides of chest make contact with handles while keeping body straight. Return until arms are extended straight and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position suspension handles higher than arms' length above floor. Sit on floor and grasp handles. Hang shoulders under handles with arms straight, back and hips straight, with knees bent and feet flat on floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up so sides of chest make contact with handles while keeping body straight. Return until arms are extended straight and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handle(s) with one hand. Step back until handle is chest height when held to side of chest. Facing suspension apparatus with feet shoulder width apart, point other arm and its shoulder forward, parallel with angle of strap.
exercise.execution: Rotate body and extended arm, reaching outward while lowering body downward by extending arm holding onto handle. Extend arms and shoulders in-line with suspension strap so body is angled back to one side. Return by raising body back upward in opposite motion, reaching outward and toward suspension strap while pulling handle back to side of chest until body is upright and arm parallel with angle of strap. Repeat and continue with opposite side.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body reclines back behind suspension handles. Position body and legs straight at desired angle, hanging from handles with arms straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up so sides of chest make contact with handles while keeping body and legs straight. Return until arms are extended straight and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm position.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Kneel onto platform or step onto bar.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel grips. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel grips. Step down onto assistance lever or platform.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Step down onto assistance lever or platform.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie upper back perpendicular on bench. Flex hips slightly. Grasp barbell from behind and position over chest with elbows bent slightly.
exercise.execution: With elbows bent slightly, lower bar over and beyond head until shoulders are fully flexed or upper arms are approximately parallel to torso. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie upper back perpendicular on bench. Flex hips slightly. Grasp barbell from behind and position over chest with elbows bent approximately 90°.
exercise.execution: With elbow bent, lower bar over and just behind head until upper arm is approximately parallel to torso. Return and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp parallel cable attachment. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachment to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down one cable attachment to side of chest. Return until arm and shoulder is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrup in one hand. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachment to side of chest. Return until arm and shoulder is fully extended, allowing shoulder to raise. Repeat and continue with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrup in one hand and kneel on floor.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachment to side of chest. Return until arm and shoulder is fully extended, allowing shoulder to raise. Repeat and continue with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachments to sides of chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on mat slightly away from high pulley. Grasp cable rope attachment with both hands. Sit with hips back and bend down by flexing hips so torso is bent over at approximately 30º angle. Allow resistance on cable pulley to pull arms upward with elbows bent.
exercise.execution: Pull cable rope down until elbows are back and inside of rope attachment is behind neck. Return attachment over head until shoulder is completely flexed upward. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable bar to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down one cable attachment to front side shoulder. Return until arm and shoulder are fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Grasp parallel cable attachment. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachment to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp pro lat bar with wide parallel grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable bar to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachments to front sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie upper back perpendicular on bench. Flex hips slightly, so hips are slightly lower than torso. Grasp revolving barbell cable attachment from behind. Pull to position cable attachment over chest. Fix elbows with small bend.
exercise.execution: Lower cable attachment toward pulley with elbows bent only slightly. Lower until shoulders are fully flexed or upper arms are in-line with upper torso. Raise cable attachment over head and continue toward lower body until cable becomes very close to head. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Face high pulley and grasp revolving cable attachment with arm slightly bent. Place one foot slightly back and bend over at hip until shoulder is fully flexed (upper arms at sides of head).
exercise.execution: With elbows fixed approximately 30°, pull cable attachment down until upper arms are to sides. Return attachment overhead. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench facing away from cable pulley apparatus. Grasp revolving cable attachment over head with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: With elbows fixed with slight bend, pull cable attachment forward and down as far as possible. Return cable attachment forward and overhead. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place dip belt around waist. Kneel close to low pulley or lever and attach hook to dip belt chains. Step up and grasp bars with shoulder width underhand grip. Lift legs off of steps or floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place dip belt around waist. Kneel as close as possible to low pulley or lever and attach hook to dip belt in front between legs. Step up and grasp close grip p arallel bars with hands facing inward. Lift legs off of steps or floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place dip belt around waist. Kneel as close as possible to low pulley or lever and attach hook to dip belt in front between legs. Step up and grasp parallel bars with hands facing inward. Lift legs off of steps or floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place dip belt around waist. Kneel close to low pulley or lever and attach hook to dip belt. Step up and grasp bars with overhand wide grip. Lift legs off of steps or floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place dip belt around waist. Kneel close to low pulley or lever and attach hook to dip belt. Step up and grasp bars with overhand wide grip. Lift legs off of steps or floor.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull cable bar down behind neck. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Lean forward and step back with one foot so stance is staggered. Position hands with underhand or neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull down one cable attachment to front of shoulder. Return until arm and shoulder are fully extended. Repeat movement with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrups in each hand. Lean forward and step back with one foot so stance is staggered. Bend forward knee slightly. Position hands with underhand or neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull down left cable attachment to front of shoulder. Pull right cable attachment down to front of other shoulder while returning left cable attachment to front of shoulder. Repeat movement with both arms in opposite pattern by pulling left cable attachment while returning right pully attachment. Continuing by alternating movement pattern between sides.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing very high pulley. Grasp stirrup in one hand and step back so arm is straight. With leg of opposite side as loaded arm, plant forefoot far back on floor. Slightly bend knee of forward leg, same direction as foot.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable attachment to side of chest and rotate body toward side of pulling arm. Return until arm and shoulder is fully extended, allowing shoulder to raise. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable bar with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down cable bar to upper chest until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp handles and sit with thighs under padded supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever bar to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp handles to each side with overhand grip. Sit on seat and position thighs under leg pads.
exercise.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull lever bar down behind neck. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever handles toward sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever bar with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever handles toward sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp parallel lever bars. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp parallel lever bars. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever handles. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand on platform and grasp handles to sides with palms down grip.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, pull lever handles down below hips. Return lever handles upward just above shoulder high, or just before slight pressure in shoulder is felt. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp handles with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp handles with overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp parallel handles.
exercise.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine and push foot lever. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind. Release foot lever and place feet on platform or to sides.
exercise.execution: Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever handles to sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down lever handles to upper chest until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
exercise.execution: Pull down one lever handle to side until elbow is down to side. Return until arm and shoulder are fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate pulldown between arms.
