exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bars angled inward with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp close grip parallel bars.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bars angled inward with underhand shoulder width grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with neutral grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and place bent knee inside of band. Stretch band down further by pointing knee downward. Reach up and grasp bars to each side with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp parallel bars while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp middle of hanging exercise band and pull down to side of leg. Lift foot and hook band under heel. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Face perpendicular under pullup bar and position band behind body. Pull band apart and place other foot onto band so both feet are together inside of band. Reach up and grasp pull-up bar with overhand wide grip while keeping legs straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bars angled inward with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel bars.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bars to each side with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides or chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with underhand grip shoulder width. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until elbows are to sides, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above bar, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Position forefeet on floor just behind low bar or on bench just behind high bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent allowing knees to bend. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp high suspension handles.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing suspension handles placed at neck height. Grasp handles and position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of handles.
exercise.execution: Lower body under handles until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above handles, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat facing stability ball within arm's reach. Straighten hips with subtle bend. Also straighten arms with slight bend, down in front of body. Place fists side by side on upper side of ball closest to hips.
exercise.execution: Lean forward and roll ridged arms out over ball. Roll forward as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat. Grasp handles on wheel to each side with overhand grip. Position wheel near front of knees and lean over wheel with arms extended downward, supporting upper body.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, roll wheel out as far as possible. Lower body gently to floor extending arms forward. Raise body back up by flexing hips and pulling arms back to original position. Return until hips are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat and grasp suspension trainer handles. Position body upright with subtle bend through hip. Also, straighten arms in front of body with slight bend.
exercise.execution: Lean body forward while maintaining small bend in hip. Allow arms to bend forward to sides of head. Bend over as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Allow upper body to hang downward while keeping arms to sides of head. Hold stretch.
Lower torso as far down as possible and sit back. Hold stretch.

exercise.exerciseName: Bent-over Lat Stretch (on chair or bench)

exercise.mechanic: Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch.
Pull elbow toward head and back or pull arm down toward opposite shoulder. Lean torso to side, away from direction of arm behind head. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull participant's wrist toward back of shoulder. Lean torso to side, away from direction of arm behind head. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Lean and reach to side away from raised arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull arms toward floor and back sides of head. Hold stretch.
Lean and reach to side away from raised arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Keeping feet flat on floor, squat down as low as possible and bend down with arms straight. Lean back slightly and allow shoulders to stretch forward. Hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Sit on end of bench and grasp cambered bar from beneath with overhand or mixed grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding barbell with overhand or mixed grip; shoulder width or slightly wider.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step into trap barbell and stand holding handles of trap bar to sides.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step into elevated trap bar stand. Bend down and grasp handles of apparatus to sides. Stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing low pulley and grasp cable bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Stand close to pulley.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position adjustable pulleys at low position. Stand close to cable bar and grasp with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrup with one hand and stand close to low pulley to side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulder as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding dumbbells to sides.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded lever.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench and grasp lower handles to each side. Sit upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height. Stand grasping bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand very near to close lever handles. Bend over and grasp handles with each hand. Stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded lever.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and place forearms in padded bars.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding lever bar with shoulder width overhand or mixed grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded bar.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand grasping smith bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with barbell with overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder width. Feet point forward hip's width apart or slightly wider. Bend knees and hips so barbell touches mid-thigh; shoulders over bar with back arched. Arms are straight with elbows pointed along bar. Chest is spread and wrists are slightly flexed.
exercise.execution: Jump upward extending body. Shrug shoulders and pull barbell upward with arms, allowing elbows to flex out to sides, keeping bar close to body. Aggressively pull body under bar, rotating elbows around bar. Catch bar on shoulders while moving into squat position. Hitting bottom of squat, stand up immediately.

exercise.preparation: Stand between parallel bars. Squat down and grasp parallel bars from above. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down. Legs can be kept bent or straight, positioned vertically.
exercise.execution: Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp gymnastics rings, one in each hand. Sit on mat between parallel bars. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down.
exercise.execution: Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Tilt head away from lowered shoulder by positioning ear toward front of opposite shoulder. Hold stretch. Repeat to other side.
Pull up on chair leg by position torso more upright while allowing left shoulder to be pulled downward. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side while sitting slightly angled to left.
Lean back allowing body and hips to fall back and shoulders to be pulled forward. Hold stretch.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Lean back allowing body and hips to fall back and shoulders to be pulled forward. Hold stretch.
Bring elbows closer together in front of body. Raise elbows slightly and hold stretch.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit with side to low pulley. Grasp dumbbell cable attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment away from body by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand with side to elbow height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment away from body as far as possible by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing low to medium height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment and position bent elbow shoulder height out to side with forearm in line with cable.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrup up and back as far as possible. Return by lowering stirrup to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie on side with legs separated for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip over and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie high up on low incline bench or reverse on decline bench on side with arm pit over leg pad (as demonstrated). Position legs lower on bench for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell upright above elbow by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip body over and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with legs either on bench or down to each side. Grasp dumbbell with one hand and position forearm vertically with upper arm perpendicular to body.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell forward and upward by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Grasp with opposite hand, position bent arm out to side of body, and perform with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench with legs extended down to each side. Grasp dumbbell with one hand and position forearm vertically with upper arm perpendicular to body.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell forward and upward by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Grasp with opposite hand, position bent arm out to side of body, and perform with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench. Place foot on other side of bench and other foot on floor with knees bent. Place upper elbow on knee with dumbbell positioned above knee.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell downward toward lower leg by rotating shoulder until slight stretch is felt. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand or sit with dumbbell positioned out to side of head; bend elbow, shoulder height with dumbbell above elbow.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotation (with support)
exercise.preparation: Stand or sit with side against chest height platform. With dumbbell in hand, position upper arm horizontally on platform, elbow bent so forearm is upright.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on section of bench nearest pads to each side. Position body so shoulders and elbows are aligned to fulcrum on each side. Place wrists or back of hands on under upper set of pads to each side.
exercise.execution: Pull both lever arms back and down as far as possible to each side of head by simultaneously rotating upper arms. Lower lever arms to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place elbow on forearm pad and grasp handle with upper arm to side of body and forearm against body.
exercise.execution: Pull lever away from body. Return and repeat. Adjust lever to opposite side and repeat with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Lever should be forward with lever handle down. Push elbow pad forward with forearm, grasp handle with overhand grip. Sit on seat with arm pads and lever to side and position in elbow pad at shoulder height. With opposite hand, grasp seat handle if available, for added stability.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handle upward and back as far as possible by rotating upper arm. Lower lever to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.mechanic: Pull upper end of pole forward so shoulder is internally rotated. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch .
Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch.
Allow legs and hips to fall to side of positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
Keeping elbow bend at a right angle, push forearm downward toward floor. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
Keeping elbows bend at a right angles, push forearms downward toward floor and hold stretch.
Lower bend arms toward floor and hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handles and position bent elbows to each sides of waist.
exercise.execution: Pull handles apart from each side, while keeping fixed elbow position and body and legs straight throughout movement. Raise forward so handles are to each side of body. Return back until handles come back together in front of body. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.

exercise.preparation: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Step down onto assistance lever with hips and knees bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Kneel on padded platform, lowering it down slightly so hips are slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to lower chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Have assistant hold board on center of chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight toward lower chest on to board. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on floor at base of power rack. Place feet on floor with knees bent. Grasp bar from rack with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to lower chest until the triceps are completely on the floor. Relax momentarily, then press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to neck to upper chest. Upper arms will be perpendicular to torso. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp barbell loaded with thick chains from each side, with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace. Dismount barbell from rack over chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step between wide dip bars with dip belt around waist. Kneel as close as possible to low pulley and attach cable to dip belt. Stand up and mount dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips and knees bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Lie supine on decline bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Bring cable stirrups together above upper abdomen in hugging motion; elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing low pulley stirrup attachments. Lie supine on bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows pointed high, bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Stand with pulleys to each side. Bend over slightly by flexing hips and knees. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back initially.
exercise.execution: Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on bench and grasp stirrups attached to low cable pulley on each side. Position stirrups out to each side of chest with bent arm under each wrist.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups up over each shoulder until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position adjustable pulley higher than intended height but within arms reach from bench. Position bench under cable bar. Lie supine on bench. While lying on bench, reach over and lower each pulley into intended position so that cables are taut in lowest position with bar on chest. Grasp bar with both hands using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Press bar upward until arms are extended. Lower bar to chest or until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups out straight until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbows out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arm.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups out straight in front of shoulder until arm is straight. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt through shoulder or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two shoulder height pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups to sides of chest with elbows out to sides. Position forearms horizontally and parallel with hands elbow width. Step forward in lunging posture (one foot in front and other foot behind). Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups forward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing behind cable bar, mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg.
exercise.execution: Push cable bar forward until arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbow out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width, in front of upper arm. Lean forward in seat.
exercise.execution: Push stirrup out in front of upper chest while turning torso away from pulley. Return stirrup and torso back to original position allowing torso to rotate back until slight stretch is felt through chest, shoulder or waist. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups forward and slightly downward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable Bar Standing Decline Chest Press
exercise.preparation: Stand facing behind cable bar mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind and above. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward knee.
exercise.execution: Push cable bar forward and downward until bar is about hip height and arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two high pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups down to sides of lower chest with elbows high out to sides. Angle forearms downward with hands elbow width or slightly narrower. Lean and step forward with forward leg bent or stand feet side by side with both legs slightly bent (as shown).
exercise.execution: Push stirrups at forward/downward angle until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrup from chest height pulley. Turn body away from pulley. Position elbow of loaded arm out to side, lower chest height. Position loaded hand back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Step far forward with foot of opposite side of loaded arm. Bend knees and position heel off rear foot off floor.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups away from body, horizontally until arm is straight and inline with cable. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit down on bench with dumbbells resting on lower thigh. Kick weights to shoulder and lie back. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell.
exercise.execution: Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit down on decline bench with feet under leg brace and dumbbells resting on thigh. Lie back with dumbbells. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell.
exercise.execution: Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on decline bench. Support dumbbells above upper abdomen with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are to sides.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on bench. Support dumbbells above chest with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed in slightly bent position. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on upper back perpendicular to bench. Flex hips slightly. Grasp one dumbbell from behind or from side with both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Position dumbbell over chest with elbows slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bars angled inward with underhand shoulder width grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with neutral grip while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and place bent knee inside of band. Stretch band down further by pointing knee downward. Reach up and grasp bars to each side with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp parallel bars while keeping banded leg straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp middle of hanging exercise band and pull down to side of leg. Lift foot and hook band under heel. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Face perpendicular under pullup bar and position band behind body. Pull band apart and place other foot onto band so both feet are together inside of band. Reach up and grasp pull-up bar with overhand wide grip while keeping legs straight.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bars angled inward with underhand shoulder width grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel bars.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Reach up and grasp bars to each side with wide overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides or chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with underhand grip shoulder width. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until elbows are to sides, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above bar, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Position forefeet on floor just behind low bar or on bench just behind high bar.
exercise.execution: Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent allowing knees to bend. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp high suspension handles.
exercise.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing suspension handles placed at neck height. Grasp handles and position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of handles.
exercise.execution: Lower body under handles until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above handles, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat facing stability ball within arm's reach. Straighten hips with subtle bend. Also straighten arms with slight bend, down in front of body. Place fists side by side on upper side of ball closest to hips.
exercise.execution: Lean forward and roll ridged arms out over ball. Roll forward as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat. Grasp handles on wheel to each side with overhand grip. Position wheel near front of knees and lean over wheel with arms extended downward, supporting upper body.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, roll wheel out as far as possible. Lower body gently to floor extending arms forward. Raise body back up by flexing hips and pulling arms back to original position. Return until hips are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat and grasp suspension trainer handles. Position body upright with subtle bend through hip. Also, straighten arms in front of body with slight bend.
exercise.execution: Lean body forward while maintaining small bend in hip. Allow arms to bend forward to sides of head. Bend over as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Allow upper body to hang downward while keeping arms to sides of head. Hold stretch.
Lower torso as far down as possible and sit back. Hold stretch.

exercise.exerciseName: Bent-over Lat Stretch (on chair or bench)

exercise.mechanic: Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch.
Pull elbow toward head and back or pull arm down toward opposite shoulder. Lean torso to side, away from direction of arm behind head. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull participant's wrist toward back of shoulder. Lean torso to side, away from direction of arm behind head. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Lean and reach to side away from raised arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Pull arms toward floor and back sides of head. Hold stretch.
Lean and reach to side away from raised arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Keeping feet flat on floor, squat down as low as possible and bend down with arms straight. Lean back slightly and allow shoulders to stretch forward. Hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Sit on end of bench and grasp cambered bar from beneath with overhand or mixed grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding barbell with overhand or mixed grip; shoulder width or slightly wider.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step into trap barbell and stand holding handles of trap bar to sides.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step into elevated trap bar stand. Bend down and grasp handles of apparatus to sides. Stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing low pulley and grasp cable bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Stand close to pulley.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position adjustable pulleys at low position. Stand close to cable bar and grasp with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp stirrup with one hand and stand close to low pulley to side.
exercise.execution: With arms straight, elevate shoulder as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding dumbbells to sides.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded lever.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench and grasp lower handles to each side. Sit upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height. Stand grasping bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand very near to close lever handles. Bend over and grasp handles with each hand. Stand upright.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded lever.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and place forearms in padded bars.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand holding lever bar with shoulder width overhand or mixed grip.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with shoulders under padded bar.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand grasping smith bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand with barbell with overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder width. Feet point forward hip's width apart or slightly wider. Bend knees and hips so barbell touches mid-thigh; shoulders over bar with back arched. Arms are straight with elbows pointed along bar. Chest is spread and wrists are slightly flexed.
exercise.execution: Jump upward extending body. Shrug shoulders and pull barbell upward with arms, allowing elbows to flex out to sides, keeping bar close to body. Aggressively pull body under bar, rotating elbows around bar. Catch bar on shoulders while moving into squat position. Hitting bottom of squat, stand up immediately.

exercise.preparation: Stand between parallel bars. Squat down and grasp parallel bars from above. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down. Legs can be kept bent or straight, positioned vertically.
exercise.execution: Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp gymnastics rings, one in each hand. Sit on mat between parallel bars. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down.
exercise.execution: Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Tilt head away from lowered shoulder by positioning ear toward front of opposite shoulder. Hold stretch. Repeat to other side.
Pull up on chair leg by position torso more upright while allowing left shoulder to be pulled downward. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side while sitting slightly angled to left.
Lean back allowing body and hips to fall back and shoulders to be pulled forward. Hold stretch.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Lean back allowing body and hips to fall back and shoulders to be pulled forward. Hold stretch.
Bring elbows closer together in front of body. Raise elbows slightly and hold stretch.
Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Push elbow toward chest. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit with side to low pulley. Grasp dumbbell cable attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment away from body by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand with side to elbow height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Pull cable attachment away from body as far as possible by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing low to medium height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment and position bent elbow shoulder height out to side with forearm in line with cable.
exercise.execution: Pull stirrup up and back as far as possible. Return by lowering stirrup to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie on side with legs separated for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip over and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie high up on low incline bench or reverse on decline bench on side with arm pit over leg pad (as demonstrated). Position legs lower on bench for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell upright above elbow by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip body over and continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with legs either on bench or down to each side. Grasp dumbbell with one hand and position forearm vertically with upper arm perpendicular to body.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell forward and upward by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Grasp with opposite hand, position bent arm out to side of body, and perform with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench with legs extended down to each side. Grasp dumbbell with one hand and position forearm vertically with upper arm perpendicular to body.
exercise.execution: Lift dumbbell forward and upward by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Grasp with opposite hand, position bent arm out to side of body, and perform with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit on bench. Place foot on other side of bench and other foot on floor with knees bent. Place upper elbow on knee with dumbbell positioned above knee.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell downward toward lower leg by rotating shoulder until slight stretch is felt. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Stand or sit with dumbbell positioned out to side of head; bend elbow, shoulder height with dumbbell above elbow.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.exerciseName: Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotation (with support)
exercise.preparation: Stand or sit with side against chest height platform. With dumbbell in hand, position upper arm horizontally on platform, elbow bent so forearm is upright.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on section of bench nearest pads to each side. Position body so shoulders and elbows are aligned to fulcrum on each side. Place wrists or back of hands on under upper set of pads to each side.
exercise.execution: Pull both lever arms back and down as far as possible to each side of head by simultaneously rotating upper arms. Lower lever arms to original position and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Place elbow on forearm pad and grasp handle with upper arm to side of body and forearm against body.
exercise.execution: Pull lever away from body. Return and repeat. Adjust lever to opposite side and repeat with other arm.

exercise.preparation: Lever should be forward with lever handle down. Push elbow pad forward with forearm, grasp handle with overhand grip. Sit on seat with arm pads and lever to side and position in elbow pad at shoulder height. With opposite hand, grasp seat handle if available, for added stability.
exercise.execution: Pull lever handle upward and back as far as possible by rotating upper arm. Lower lever to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.mechanic: Pull upper end of pole forward so shoulder is internally rotated. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch .
Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch.
Allow legs and hips to fall to side of positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
Keeping elbow bend at a right angle, push forearm downward toward floor. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
Keeping elbows bend at a right angles, push forearms downward toward floor and hold stretch.
Lower bend arms toward floor and hold stretch.

exercise.preparation: Grasp suspension handles and position bent elbows to each sides of waist.
exercise.execution: Pull handles apart from each side, while keeping fixed elbow position and body and legs straight throughout movement. Raise forward so handles are to each side of body. Return back until handles come back together in front of body. Repeat.

exercise.mechanic: Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.

exercise.preparation: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Step down onto assistance lever with hips and knees bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Kneel on padded platform, lowering it down slightly so hips are slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to lower chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Have assistant hold board on center of chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight toward lower chest on to board. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on floor at base of power rack. Place feet on floor with knees bent. Grasp bar from rack with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to lower chest until the triceps are completely on the floor. Relax momentarily, then press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to neck to upper chest. Upper arms will be perpendicular to torso. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Grasp barbell loaded with thick chains from each side, with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace. Dismount barbell from rack over chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Step between wide dip bars with dip belt around waist. Kneel as close as possible to low pulley and attach cable to dip belt. Stand up and mount dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips and knees bent.
exercise.execution: Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight and repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Lie supine on decline bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Bring cable stirrups together above upper abdomen in hugging motion; elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing low pulley stirrup attachments. Lie supine on bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows pointed high, bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Stand with pulleys to each side. Bend over slightly by flexing hips and knees. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back initially.
exercise.execution: Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on bench and grasp stirrups attached to low cable pulley on each side. Position stirrups out to each side of chest with bent arm under each wrist.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups up over each shoulder until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Position adjustable pulley higher than intended height but within arms reach from bench. Position bench under cable bar. Lie supine on bench. While lying on bench, reach over and lower each pulley into intended position so that cables are taut in lowest position with bar on chest. Grasp bar with both hands using wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Press bar upward until arms are extended. Lower bar to chest or until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups out straight until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbows out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arm.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups out straight in front of shoulder until arm is straight. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt through shoulder or chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two shoulder height pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups to sides of chest with elbows out to sides. Position forearms horizontally and parallel with hands elbow width. Step forward in lunging posture (one foot in front and other foot behind). Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups forward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand facing behind cable bar, mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg.
exercise.execution: Push cable bar forward until arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbow out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width, in front of upper arm. Lean forward in seat.
exercise.execution: Push stirrup out in front of upper chest while turning torso away from pulley. Return stirrup and torso back to original position allowing torso to rotate back until slight stretch is felt through chest, shoulder or waist. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups forward and slightly downward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Cable Bar Standing Decline Chest Press
exercise.preparation: Stand facing behind cable bar mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind and above. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward knee.
exercise.execution: Push cable bar forward and downward until bar is about hip height and arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between two high pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups down to sides of lower chest with elbows high out to sides. Angle forearms downward with hands elbow width or slightly narrower. Lean and step forward with forward leg bent or stand feet side by side with both legs slightly bent (as shown).
exercise.execution: Push stirrups at forward/downward angle until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp cable stirrup from chest height pulley. Turn body away from pulley. Position elbow of loaded arm out to side, lower chest height. Position loaded hand back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Step far forward with foot of opposite side of loaded arm. Bend knees and position heel off rear foot off floor.
exercise.execution: Push stirrups away from body, horizontally until arm is straight and inline with cable. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

exercise.preparation: Sit down on bench with dumbbells resting on lower thigh. Kick weights to shoulder and lie back. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell.
exercise.execution: Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit down on decline bench with feet under leg brace and dumbbells resting on thigh. Lie back with dumbbells. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell.
exercise.execution: Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on decline bench. Support dumbbells above upper abdomen with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are to sides.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on bench. Support dumbbells above chest with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides.
exercise.execution: Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed in slightly bent position. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie on upper back perpendicular to bench. Flex hips slightly. Grasp one dumbbell from behind or from side with both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Position dumbbell over chest with elbows slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on lower pad with back against upper pad, facing dumbbell in rack. Position feet under padded bars. Grasp dumbbell by handle with both hands. Pull top of dumbbell to chest. Push dumbbell up over chest with both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Raise hips up from pad and recline torso back so chest faces upward. Keep hips and elbows slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat of arched bench with dumbbell on lower thigh. Kick dumbbell up to shoulder while lying back on bench. Grasp both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Position dumbbell over chest with elbows slightly bent.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upper chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with oblique grip. If possible, place handles in wide position. Lean forward slightly.
exercise.execution: Push lever down with elbows away from body. Return until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press levers until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with handles lower chest height. Grasp handle with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Wide Grip Chest Press (plate loaded)
exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip and elbows out to sides.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: If possible, place handles in wide position. Sit on seat and grasp handles with oblique grip. Lean forward slightly and allow elbows to flare out.
exercise.execution: Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: If possible, place handles in wide position. Sit on seat with legs under pads. Grasp handles with oblique grip. Lean slightly forward and allow elbows to flare out.
exercise.execution: Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Lever Bent-over Fly (on iron cross machine)
exercise.preparation: Stand on platform in front of Lever Iron Cross Machine. Grasp handles to each side. Bend over at hips with knees and elbows bent slightly. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are pointing upward.
exercise.execution: Bring lever handles together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with back against seat. Position both arms over back of padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders, wrists are slightly lower than elbows.
exercise.execution: Bring padded levers together by pushing pads forward and downward in hugging motion. Return to starting position until chests muscle are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench. Position both arms under padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Bring padded levers upward and together in hugging motion. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on machine with back on pad. If available, push foot lever until padded lever moves forward. Place forearms on padded lever. Position upper arms approximately parallel. Release foot lever.
exercise.execution: Push levers together. Return until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on machine with back on pad. If available, push foot lever until padded lever moves forward. Place forearms on padded lever. Position upper arms approximately parallel. Release foot lever.
exercise.execution: Push levers together. Return until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on machine with back on pad. Grasp handles to both sides, shoulder height. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows pointed high, push lever handles forward and together. Return to back toward original position until mild stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on machine with back on pad. Grasp handles to both sides, shoulder height. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back.
exercise.execution: Keeping elbows pointed high, push lever handles forward and together. Return to back toward original position until mild stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with back against pad and feet on foot bar. Position both arms behind padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are pointed back.
exercise.execution: Bring padded levers forward and together in hugging motion. Return to starting position until stretch in chests or shoulder is felt. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Straddle seat with both levers positioned slightly above horizontal. Grasp both lever ends with elbows slightly above levers. Sit down near end of seat with torso leaning forward slightly and slightly bent elbows pointing back.
exercise.execution: Push levers downward and together in hugging motion. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed slightly upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upp er chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press one lever until arm is extended. Return lever back until chest muscle is slightly stretched. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of horizontal handles. If available, push foot lever until lever is within grasping range. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Release foot lever.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with sides of ribs approximately height of parallel handles. If available, push foot lever until handles are within grasping range. Grasp parallel handles. Release foot lever.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until shoulders or chest feels slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
exercise.execution: Press one lever until arm is extended. Return lever back until chest muscle is slightly stretched. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace and chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip.
exercise.execution: Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to chest. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Stand between handles facing machine. Bend forward slightly and grasp parallel handles with oblique grip. Position elbows upward and outward. Bend knees just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack.
exercise.execution: Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.exerciseName: Sled Horizontal Grip Standing Chest Dip
exercise.preparation: Stand between handles facing machine. Bend forward slightly and grasp transverse handles with overhand grip. Position elbows upward and outward. Bend knees just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack.
exercise.execution: Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on bench with chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

exercise.preparation: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace and chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
exercise.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
